title: Promotion League Community UTM Please Come be apart
body:
Hi and welcome to Under The Mountain. This is a community site for league of legends players who are looking to share there experience.Share your replays, Discover new players and friends. Enjoy your experience Leagues greatest community site today. Make sure to tune into https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_ROKFB4366BOL-Pe2sdaDg for community montages, top plays and much more. If you want be featured on the next episode email us at underthemountainlol@gmail.com. We would also like to help promote anyone big or small im the community so please come join today for an experience of a lifetime and help us help you today.
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_ROKFB4366BOL-Pe2sdaDg 
https://www.facebook.com/UTMlolcommunity/ 
https://twitter.com/UTMLOL
